thread.title: Vornado’s Plan to Focus on New York Real Estate Hits a Snag

author: WSJ Real Estate
title: Vornado’s Plan to Focus on New York Real Estate Hits a Snag

organizations.name: focus on new york real estate hits

text:
COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE Vornado’s Plan to Focus on New York Real Estate Hits a Snag: New York Real Estate For more than four years, Vornado Realty Trust has been working hard to shed suburban retail and Washington, D.C., office properties worth billions of dollars in hopes that equity investors would like the company more as a simple New York City commercial landlord. So far the strategy hasn’t panned out.
Axar Capital Management Takes a Stake in a Real Estate Debt Firm
